alert.note: Alert for Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LIBERTY AND MCINTOSH COUNTIES... At 322 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Everett to near Little Saint Simons Island to 26 miles southeast of Sea Island, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Darien, Wolf Island, Eulonia, Valona, Little Saint Simons Island, Meridian, Crescent, and Carnigan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh
